metadata.title: CVE-2017-17093 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
wp-includes/general-template.php in WordPress before 4.9.1 does notproperly restrict the lang attribute of an HTML element, which might allowattackers to conduct XSS attacks via the language setting of a site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.9.5+dfsg1-1').
